signIn.completed: Now, you can try asking: 'Hey Google, ask Nightscout Status what my glucose is'.
signIn.healthDisclaimer: Remember: the information provided by Nightscout Status is not a substitute for advice from a medical professional.

errors.unknown-error: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. It will be investigated as soon as possible.
errors.noNsSite: Before I can check your glucose, I'll need the URL of your Nightscout site. You can enter it by visiting {{- homepageUrl}}
errors.noBgReading: Hmmm. I could not find a recent glucose reading.

invalidUrl.p1: Sorry, the Nightscout URL you gave me doesn't appear to be valid. Can you check on {{- homepageUrl}} ?
invalidUrl.p2: Make sure your url starts with http.

errors.notFound: Sorry, I couldn't find your Nightscout site. Check if you've entered the correct URL on {{- homepageUrl}}
errors.unauthorized: Sorry, it looks like I don't have permission to access your Nightscout site. Try entering your API secret on {{- homepageUrl}}
errors.nsSiteError: Sorry, there seems to be a problem with your Nightscout site. I wasn't able to get your status.

description.short: Check your current glucose level from Nightscout
description.full: Ask the Google Assistant about your current glucose level.

sample-invocations: Ok Google, talk to Nightscout Status
Ok Google, ask Nightscout Status what my glucose is

common.google-tm: Google Assistant is a trademark of Google Inc.

header.title: Nightscout Status
header.subtitle: Nightscout for Google Home & Google Assistant (unofficial)

example-conversation.nightscout-status-resp: 120 and rising slowly as of 4 minutes ago

settings.connect: Connect your Nightscout site to get started:
settings.invalid-url: Are you sure this URL is correct?
settings.use-token-url: Try using a token-url or check your API secret

api-secret-info.title: Do I have to enter my API Secret ?
api-secret-info.info: This is only needed if your Nightscout site is 'read protected'. (for example if {{0}} is set to {{1}})

settings.unable-to-get-reading: We weren't able to get a glucose reading from:
settings.hint: You can shorten the invocation using {{0}}. {{1}} For example: "Hey Google, check my sugar."

disclaimer.1: This disclaimer gets <u>repeated every time</u> you ask for your glucose level
disclaimer.2: You can turn this off by clicking the button below
disclaimer.3:
If you choose to turn the disclaimer off, you agree that:
- you have read and understand the disclaimer
- you explicitly request it will no longer be repeated

footer.tos: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.intro: This document describes the information being collected by Nightscout Status, {{0}} (the "Service" or the "Software") and how this information is used.
privacy-policy.collection-desc: The Service needs 2 things in order to work: the email address of your Google Account (so it can know it's you when you make a request), and the URL of your Nightscout instance (so it can look up your glucose and read it to you).
privacy-policy.use-desc: When you invoke the Service through Google Assistant (i.e.: by saying: 'Hey Google, talk to Nightscout Status), the Service looks at your email address, and checks if there's a Nightscout site associated with it. If so, your current glucose level is read from your Nightscout site.
privacy-policy.sharing-desc: Your email address or Nightscout URL will never be shared with a third party. I just need it so I know which Nightscout site to check when you invoke the Action. Data from your Nightscout website is not saved, not even to log files.
privacy-policy.deleting-desc: You can choose to revoke access at any time: Simply via log in, remove your Nightscout URL, and click Save. You can also remove Nightscout Status from your {{0}}.
privacy-policy.analytics-desc: After you sign in to this site, some anonymous statistics about your visit are collected using a cookie (Google Analytics). The cookie is not enabled until after you've accepted this Privacy Policy. I'm using Analytics to better understand how people are using this site, how they found it, and which demographic they're in. This only applies to {{0}}, not to usage of the Assistant Action itself. If you'd like to opt-out of the Google Analytics cookie, you can do so by visiting {{1}}

health.title: Healthcare information disclaimer
health.disclaimer-short: The information provided by Nightscout Status is not a substitute for advice from a medical professional.
health.disclaimer: $t(terms.health.disclaimer-short) If you have questions about treatment or need advice, remember to always ask your doctor!
